styles.name: Ghibli
styles.prompt: Studio Ghibli–inspired animation: hand‑painted watercolor/gouache backgrounds, warm pastel palette, soft diffused sunlight, clean thin lines, rounded characters with large expressive eyes, subtle cel‑shading, tranquil whimsical mood, nature‑rich scenes.

styles.name: Pixar 3D Animation
styles.prompt: Pixar‑quality stylized 3D animation: physically based shading with gentle specular highlights, global illumination look, soft area lights with a warm rim light, polished materials, cinematic family‑friendly mood.

styles.name: Anime (Shōnen)
styles.prompt: High‑energy shōnen anime: crisp lineart, dynamic poses, speed lines, bold cel‑shading, saturated colors, dramatic angles, expressive eyes and brows, action‑packed composition.

styles.name: Seinen Manga Ink
styles.prompt: Black‑and‑white seinen manga: rich screentones, sharp hatching and cross‑hatching, cinematic panel feel, grounded anatomy, moody shadows, minimal grayscale washes.

styles.name: Western Cartoon (Retro)
styles.prompt: Mid‑century Western cartoon style: simplified shapes, rubber‑hose limbs, clean thick‑to‑thin outlines, flat colors, limited animation look, cheerful slapstick attitude.

styles.name: Ligne Claire (Franco‑Belgian)
styles.prompt: Franco‑Belgian ‘ligne claire’: uniform clean outlines, flat bright colors, minimal shading, precise architectural detail, clear readable forms, Tintin‑like clarity.

styles.name: American Comic (Silver Age)
styles.prompt: Silver Age comic book style: bold inking, halftone dots, primary color palette, dynamic foreshortening, classic superhero staging, punchy onomatopoeia accents.

styles.name: Ukiyo‑e Woodblock
styles.prompt: Traditional ukiyo‑e woodblock print: flat areas of color, flowing organic linework, stylized waves and clouds, paper grain, muted natural palette, decorative composition.

styles.name: Watercolor Storybook
styles.prompt: Gentle watercolor picture‑book: soft washes, paper texture, light bleeding edges, pastel tones, loose brushwork, cozy fairytale mood, airy negative space.

styles.name: Oil Painting (Impressionist)
styles.prompt: Impressionist oil painting: visible brush strokes, impasto texture, broken color, lively edges, warm natural light, plein‑air atmosphere, painterly spontaneity.

styles.name: Ink Wash (Sumi‑e)
styles.prompt: East Asian ink wash (sumi‑e): expressive calligraphic brushwork, value‑driven forms, soft gradients from wet ink, empty space, poetic minimalism, meditative mood.

styles.name: Pastel Chalk Sketch
styles.prompt: Soft pastel chalk drawing: velvety texture, smudged edges, tonal layering, paper tooth, gentle color transitions, sketchy line with hand‑drawn charm.

styles.name: Pixel Art (16‑bit)
styles.prompt: 16‑bit pixel art: limited palette, clean 1‑pixel outlines, cluster‑aware shading, subtle dithering, tileable patterns, retro console vibe, crisp sprite readability.

styles.name: Isometric Vector
styles.prompt: Isometric vector illustration: geometric precision, clean shapes, flat fills with subtle gradients, minimal outlines, consistent 60° axes, tidy iconographic details.

styles.name: Cel‑Shaded 3D (Toon)
styles.prompt: Cel‑shaded 3D animation look: toon outlines, quantized shading bands, simplified materials, bright stylized palette, clear silhouette, animation‑ready staging.

styles.name: Dark Fantasy Painting
styles.prompt: Dark fantasy painting: baroque drama, chiaroscuro lighting, ornate textures, gothic motifs, mythic atmosphere, painterly realism without photo references.
